title: Additional FSI shall be used for religious purpose alone
clause_text: Additional FSI shall be used for religious purpose alone. However, without taking into account the additional FSI, ancillary residential/commercial uses will be permissible up to 10% of Zonal (basic) FSI.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Additional FSI shall be used for religious purpose alone. However, without taking into account the additional FSI, ancillary residential/commercial uses will be permissible up to 10% of Zonal (basic)
